qrList.label: enablepreset
qrList.message:
/setvar key=varname preset |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=true rule=eq "/qr-chat-set-on {{getvar::preset}} \| /run {{getvar::preset}}.init" |

/flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regexflags i |
/setvar key=regex \\ |
/regex name=regexreplace \| |
/setvar key=pipe

qrList.label: isvardefined
qrList.message:
/getvar {{getvar::varname}} |
/len | /setvar key=len |
/if left=len right=0 rule=lte else="/pass true" "/pass false"

qrList.label: shuffle
qrList.message:
/len {{getvar::toshuffle}} | /setvar key=len |
/setvar key=curridx {{getvar::len}} |
/while left=curridx right=0 rule=neq "/run creamsan.shuffletoloop" |
/pass {{getvar::toshuffle}}

qrList.label: shuffletoloop
qrList.message:
/rand from=0 to={{getvar::len}} round=floor |
/setvar key=randidx |
/addvar key=curridx -1 |
/getvar index={{getvar::curridx}} toshuffle |
/setvar key=tmp |
/getvar index={{getvar::randidx}} toshuffle |
/setvar key=toshuffle index={{getvar::curridx}} |
/setvar key=toshuffle index={{getvar::randidx}} {{getvar::tmp}}
